WorkflowInfo.Name: Migrate excel file into database table
WorkflowInfo.Description: Read Excel file and insert the data into database table
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:TSQLStatement;Assembly=TSQLStatement, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\test.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /><ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns2:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="getCellValue1" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="getCellValue2" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns4:TSQLStatement Password="wwwwww" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isUserAuthenticate="True" DisplayName="TSQL Statement" IsValid="True" SiteId="0" ConnectionString="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase;User Id=db_user;Password=wwwwww;" TypeName="TSQLStatement" Query="INSERT INTO "table_name" ("column1", "column2", ...)
VALUES (%getCellValue1%, %getCellValue2%)" SiteName="Default Site" EyeShareConnectionString="False" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="tsqlStatement1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="db_user" Description="Runs a database statement on Microsoft SQL Server" ConnectionStringTextBox="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
